thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Boutique Hotel
thread.title_full: Boutique Hotel - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kate C
title: Boutique Hotel
text:
Great location just around the corner from Aldgate East tube station. Looks like an office block from the outside but is wonderful inside. Large spacious reception, contemporary dining/bar area and a lovely lounge.
We had a room on the 6th floor we were given an upgrade from a club to superior room. I'd hate to think how small club rooms are as the superior seemed a normal sized room, but then in London hotel rooms are invariable smaller. Shower room was very small but beautifully decorated. We had to leave a deposit of Â£50 on our card in case we used the mini bar but our mini bar was empty!
The hotel was in a good location as we were planning to eat in Brick Lane that night , the hotel road leads into Brick Lane so perfect.
We had the continenental breakfast. There was a large range of pastries, different breads, jams, cereals and lovely yoghurt.
We hope to come back next time we are in London
